nodes.text: I will solve the problem of people without health care
We will offer a tax credit to encourage small businesses and their employees to set up health savings accounts and provide direct help for low-income Americans to purchase them.
And we will provide low-income Americans with better access to health care:
In a new term I will ensure every poor county in America has a community or rural health center.
In a new term we must allow small firms to join together to purchase insurance at the discounts available to big companies.

These accounts give workers the security of insurance against major illness the opportunity to save tax-free for routine health expenses and the freedom of knowing you can take your account with you whenever you change jobs
We should help the small business to have an insurance
I've met many workers and small business owners who have told me they are worried they cannot afford health care. More than half of the uninsured are small business employees and their families
The best means to help people that cannot afford insurance is to help small business
